short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Better Context to automate your sales follow-up emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BetterContext AI Helper helps share your thoughts and opinions about great articles and pages on LinkedIn in simple clicks.

HOW IT WORKS:

Step 1: The Better Context AI Helper extension looks at the topics you like and adds special highlights to important words and phrases matching your topics on any webpage you're reading.
Step 2: When you're done, click the “Create LinkedIn Post” button and have your post ready in 1 minute!
Step 3: Connect your LinkedIn profile and get your post live right away.

KEY FEATURES

-Detect whether or not the current web page is relevant to your expertise and worth sharing.
-Keep updating your Topic Expert profile with new topics based on your recording history
-Record your thoughts and opinions about the current page easily
-Create your LinkedIn post in just one click!
-Write in different styles: original, simple, curious, inspiring, or funny.
-Connect to your personal LinkedIn profile in 1 minute
-Publish your post right away or schedule your posts easily

Become a more influential voice on LinkedIn with BetterContext AI Helper!
